thread.title: You Are A Testament Of The Goodness Of God – Juliana Olayode Celebrates Funke Akindele
thread.title_full: You Are A Testament Of The Goodness Of God – Juliana Olayode Celebrates Funke Akindele

author: Samuel
title: You Are A Testament Of The Goodness Of God – Juliana Olayode Celebrates Funke Akindele
text:
Home Contact Us [Tip Us: [email protected]]https://www.tori.ng/#
Juliana Olayode, the Nollywood actress, has celebrated her senior colleague and boss and veteran Nollywood star, Funke Akindele, appreciating God for her life.
Sharing a clip from Funke Akindele‘s Praise Concert on her Instagram page, she said that the actress’ life is a testimonial to great grace, his favour, and mercy.
Juliana conveyed her gratitude to God for all that He has done for her, including the progress He has made in Funke’s life.
Offering up a prayer on her behalf, she continued by saying that she is constantly reminded that all praise and honour must go to God.
In her words: “There are many ways to the heart of God, THANKSGIVING is one of them. Two days ago we gathered for #FAANpraisefiesta it was a beautiful time well spent praising God. Mama @funkejenifaakindele your life is a testament to GREAT GRACE, a testament of the goodness of God, the favor of God, the mercy of God, and the hand of God. I celebrate God over your life.
“I am so happy about the many things God has done for you/ how far He has brought you, and many more things He will do for you, because He is not done. It will only get better!!!!
“Again, I was reminded that in all that we do, we must always give honor to whom honor is due and return all the accolades to the one who truly owns it, to God!!!! FAAN praise fiesta was looking forward to the next one.”
